name: Guum - GMTK Jam 2020 Entry
description:
Escape the chaotic maze, where seemingly everything is beyond your control!

Controls

W, A, S, D - Movement

Q, E - Turn/Rotate

F - Interact

Description

Guum was developed for the GMTK Jam 2020 within 48 hours.  The theme was "Out of Control".

Design Inspirations/Notes

Ghuum was inspired by two films; Labyrinth (1986) and Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005).

Embracing uncertainty is the key.
